biotools.summary:
A web service to explore the biodiversity and biogeography of marine organisms.

- "Community ecological analysis" allows one to search for a taxon in a metabarcoding database in order to obtain.

ecological analyses (alpha and beta diversity) using graphical representations (NMDS, boxplot..).

- "Sequence based query" allows one to interrogate a metabarcoding database in order to obtain the abundance,.
